name: Journey of MyMy
description:
This is my 2D Platformer project for the coursera Unity course.

As I'm still learning, I'm glad for any kind of feedback which helps me to improve my skills. 

I did the following modifications:

  1.  Three different Levels with different tilesets and environment
  2.  Added new power ups (double jump, secret flying power up)
  3.  Added player NPC dialogues. 
  4.  The camera changes depending on the scene.
  5.  Added parallax effect.
  6.  New music. 
  7. Traps and puzzles.
  8. New animated enemies.
  9. New animated player character.
  10. A few more things I forgot to mention.

Credits:

Game Design and Development: Benjamin Piest

Music : https://void1gaming/itch.io/

Artwork: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/
